original_title: Naked Hollywood 7: Never Can Say Goodbye
overview: Breaking up is hard to do - but sometimes you can't help it! As Chad jumps from girl to girl, he winds up dumped; Lindsey and David are on the rocks, Kim leaves the group... and Tori (Asia Carrera) comes aboard with a new perspective! Old friends go, new ones arrive... it's sort of like magic.
title: Naked Hollywood 7: Never Can Say Goodbye
